results.content:
Horrible distracting music
Very boring lecturer
0 design
You have to watch without sound, but there is also useful information.
If you are ready to look at the screen without sound, write code and read subtitles at the same time, then this is right for you.
И если вы уж с таким акцентом говорите - сделайте курс на русском языке, очень сложно воспринимать вас

results.content:
Wow! The experience is amazing. The course lecturer is friendly, and well experienced in the field. He has provided a comprehensive, real-world, and easy to understand examples in this course. 

I have learnt a lot of cool things; I would recommend it to any one who needs a course on shopping bots. 

You will find satisfaction for your money.
